QuestData.Title: The Challenger's Ring: Chao the Voice
QuestData.Description:
It looks like you're quite the fighter, $p.
Chao heard about it, and she's been talking about how she'd kick your...
Well, let's just say I think you should challenge her and try to get her respect.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: An able bodied (and loud mouthed) Blackguard of the Shado-Pan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge Chao the Voice, and then defeat her in combat at Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
